comment: * Interface for receiving events about media routing changes.

methods.name: void onRoutesUpdated()
methods.comment:
* Called when the routes list changes. This includes adding, modifying, or removing
         * individual routes.

methods.name: void onSessionUpdated(@NonNull RoutingSessionInfo session)
methods.comment:
* Called when a session is changed.
         * @param session the updated session

methods.name: void onSessionReleased(@NonNull RoutingSessionInfo session)
methods.comment:
* Called when a session is released.
         * @param session the released session.
         * @see #releaseSession(RoutingSessionInfo)

methods.name: void onTransferred(@NonNull RoutingSessionInfo oldSession, @NonNull RoutingSessionInfo newSession)
methods.comment:
* Called when media is transferred.
         *
         * @param oldSession the previous session
         * @param newSession the new session

methods.name: void onTransferFailed(@NonNull RoutingSessionInfo session, @NonNull MediaRoute2Info route)
void onPreferredFeaturesChanged(@NonNull String packageName, @NonNull List<String> preferredFeatures)
methods.comment:
* Called when the preferred route features of an app is changed.
         *
         * @param packageName the package name of the application
         * @param preferredFeatures the list of preferred route features set by an application.

methods.name: void onDiscoveryPreferenceChanged(@NonNull String packageName, @NonNull RouteDiscoveryPreference discoveryPreference)
methods.comment:
* Called when the preferred route features of an app is changed.
         *
         * @param packageName the package name of the application
         * @param discoveryPreference the new discovery preference set by the application.

methods.name: void onRouteListingPreferenceUpdated(@NonNull String packageName, @Nullable RouteListingPreference routeListingPreference)
methods.comment:
* Called when the app with the given {@code packageName} updates its {@link
         * MediaRouter2#setRouteListingPreference route listing preference}.
         *
         * @param packageName The package name of the app that changed its listing preference.
         * @param routeListingPreference The new {@link RouteListingPreference} set by the app with
         *     the given {@code packageName}. Maybe null if an app has unset its preference (by
         *     passing null to {@link MediaRouter2#setRouteListingPreference}).

methods.name: void onRequestFailed(int reason)
methods.comment:
* Called when a previous request has failed.
         *
         * @param reason the reason that the request has failed. Can be one of followings:
         *               {@link MediaRoute2ProviderService#REASON_UNKNOWN_ERROR},
         *               {@link MediaRoute2ProviderService#REASON_REJECTED},
         *               {@link MediaRoute2ProviderService#REASON_NETWORK_ERROR},
         *               {@link MediaRoute2ProviderService#REASON_ROUTE_NOT_AVAILABLE},
         *               {@link MediaRoute2ProviderService#REASON_INVALID_COMMAND},

methodNames: void onTransferred(@NonNull RoutingSessionInfo oldSession, @NonNull RoutingSessionInfo newSession)
void onTransferFailed(@NonNull RoutingSessionInfo session, @NonNull MediaRoute2Info route)
void onPreferredFeaturesChanged(@NonNull String packageName, @NonNull List<String> preferredFeatures)
void onDiscoveryPreferenceChanged(@NonNull String packageName, @NonNull RouteDiscoveryPreference discoveryPreference)
void onRouteListingPreferenceUpdated(@NonNull String packageName, @Nullable RouteListingPreference routeListingPreference)
